title: Microsoft IDC | L60
content:
Education: Tier 1
Years of Experience: 1 year 9 months
Company: Microsoft
Previous TC: 24.4 LPA Base + 2 L Performance Bonus 
Title/Level: SWE - L60
Fixed Salary: 24L
Signing Bonus: 5L (3L on joining + 2L after 1 year)
RSU: $60K for 4 years
Perf Bonus: Upto 20% of base, considering 10% ~ 2.4L
Total comp for 1st year: ~ 24 + 2.4 + 12.5 + 3 = ~41.9 L,
Benefits: Standard MS benefits

I feel this is a lowball offer. Please suggest where can I negotiate.

Other details: Negotiated once, but no change
Verdict : Accepted the offer, worked there for sometime but left it due to toxic culture
